name: Secret of Harrow Manor
description: Explore an abandoned manor and it's grounds filled with nightmare creatures, locked doors, and scattered ammunition.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i7 - 4710HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 860M (GTX 970 or above required for VR) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: (can probably run on a system lower than this, this is just all I was able to test on!)
